review_title: Fantastic creative company to work for
job_title: Global Brand Success Manager in London, England
pros: Friendly, creative atmosphere!! So inspiring to work amount like minded people in a fast pace environment
cons: That it isn’t all year round!!

pros:
- Fantastic remuneration for a student job
- Amazing social life
- Great team environment
- Mixed Locations around Edinburgh
- Friendly and caring management
cons: - 6 work days a week, but three holiday days over the fringe period
